content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI executed the 'curl' command to search for news articles about the US debt ceiling on Google, which returned a list of URLs. I then attempted to use the 'read_file' command to read the output of the 'curl' command, but it returned an error stating that the file or directory could not be found."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell_popen returned: Subprocess started with PID:'1016'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "us_debt_ceiling_news.txt", "text": "https://www.cnbc.com/2022/12/02/us-debt-ceiling-deadline-what-you-need-to-know.html\\nhttps://www.cnn.com/2022/12/02/politics/debt-ceiling-deadline-government-shutdown/index.html\\nhttps://www.nbcnews.com/politics/congress/debt-ceiling-deadline-what-you-need-know-n1280063\\nhttps://www.axios.com/2022/12/02/debt-ceiling-deadline-what-to-know\\nhttps://www.nytimes.com/2022/12/02/us/politics/debt-ceiling-deadline.html\\n"}}}'}]
"""
